name: Far Wanderer
description: The Far Wanderer is a Medium aberration characterized by its unique powers and an exceptional Dexterity of 18, allowing it to be evasive and effective in stealth.
memorable: Its ability to read surface thoughts and teleport makes it a manipulating and unpredictable foe on the battlefield.
goals: To control the battlefield, confuse enemies, and gather information.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other aberrations or creatures that manipulate reality.
environment: Typically found in locations that are mysterious or associated with the cosmos.
strengths: High Dexterity and Intelligence, enabling effective attacks and evasive maneuvers.
weaknesses: Lower Constitution, Wisdom, and Charisma, affecting its resilience and interactions.
attacks: Can strike with the Stardust Blade or hit targets from a distance with the Stardust Bow, dealing cold damage as well.
most_powerful_ability: Once per day, can channel the power of Yorama to either damage or heal creatures within range.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in darkness up to 120 feet.
skills: Skilled in Arcana and Stealth, with a good proficiency in Dexterity saving throws.
additional_information: Immunity to exhaustion and poisoned conditions.
Can manipulate thoughts without a time constraint.
Appears with a dazzling starlight when teleporting.
Capable of sowing confusion among foes.
Uses language understanding for effective manipulation.
test_queries: teleporting monster with mind reading ability
mysterious creature that understands all languages
aberration that manipulates reality with starlight
creature skilled in Arcana and Stealth
